BTW...the TV is hooked up via an HDMI splitter to our cable box, along with our Sony big-screen living-room TV (which sounds great), so the audio is digital, directly from the cable box, which also does the channel selection.

Reviews.Title: owned for 6 months
Reviews.Author: Daniel Horande "Daniel Horande"
Reviews.Content: So far so good.. Excellent. I love  this TV. It is an OLD version, but it works like a charm. Only issue is Looking up for soemthing can be a pain, since you have to move the cursor on the TV with the Arrows in the TV remote to select letters. New model has a Keyboard on Remote control. I Really dont care much about this.I maybe look up for something on pandora, or youtube, or netflix, thats it. I am very happy so far...

Reviews.Title: I Am Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Shotty
Reviews.Content: The package is what the description mentioned, plus more. I was not sure if I would need to purchase a stand and/or remote,fortunately they came with the television.The product works, now I must figure how to work it.

Reviews.Title: A little clunky
Reviews.Author: person
Reviews.Content: We don't have cable so we got this purely for streaming, and it works faultlessly with Netflix, but the Amazon Prime interface is not remotely user-friendly and the short-cut button on the remote works about 5% of the time. Poor show.

Reviews.Title: Use as computer monitor.
Reviews.Author: Valerie McGilvrey "-Valerie McGilvrey"
Reviews.Content: I got this for a computer monitor and it's perfect. Great quality, nice smart TV features. Am looking at a larger screen for my living room and may get another Vizio tv since I've had such good luck with this one. The only one drawback is that it doesn't have a stand that lifts it up higher. It has a little elbow attatchment that goes in the back that the tv leans on. But, I may hang it on the wall in front of my desk so that even if I move the desk the little room will have a tv on the wall. :) That would be killing two birds with one stone.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: Dave Bujold
Reviews.Content: Love it.  Great picture, good wi-fi speed, no problems setting it up. Perfect bedroom TV, maybe I don't need cable?

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Brent
Reviews.Content: Works good. The only thing I don't like about it is the apps. They suck. Very limited in what they can do. the Amazon App really sucks. I should have known better since I have a larger Vizio TV downstairs. Other than that I would recommend to but it.

Reviews.Title: my new tv
Reviews.Author: Mary M. Anderson
Reviews.Content: I like this tv. It was easy to set up and its real light and movable. I wish the screen was 24 inches instead of 20 1/2 inches.  The width from edge to edge is 24 inches. The remote is a little small to me but it's bigger than some.  This tv enabled me to get off cable and thru the Ethernet cable and hdmi cable that I purchased on amazon, all I pay is for Netflix . This is a lot cheaper for me.

Reviews.Title: This was just what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: Linda L. Lindsey "Linda's things"
Reviews.Content: A good tv with everything I need now and in the future at  a very reasonable price  Just the right size.  I love it

Reviews.Title: Excellent Quality Television for the Price
Reviews.Author: Kimberly S.
Reviews.Content: Me and the sweetie love it!  Made her happy for Christmas, now I can get some a lot  of work done!  Steve

Reviews.Title: Bought this TV for my Grandson
Reviews.Author: Retired Bubbe
Reviews.Content: My grandson is disabled and this TV is great for him to use.  He can now get on the internet and has access to netflex.  I highly recommend this TV for everyone as it was easy to hook up.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my daughters Room!
Reviews.Author: leslie
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a Christmas present for my daughters bedroom.  It is the perfect size, great picture and love how easy it is to hook up.  For $200 this is the best deal around!

Reviews.Title: Nice Picture but....
Reviews.Author: Capt'n George "AKA Spike"
Reviews.Content: This review is for the 29" Vizio E291i-A1The Good:  Great picture quality, easy to set up the smart TV apps and I LOVE having access to Amazon Prime videos.The Bad: First there is the stand.  I know some reviewers like not having the TV mounted on a pedestal, but I find that the back brace "stand" is somewhat unstable. It also forces the screen itself to point slightly upward.  I am probably going to need to buy something to elevate the TV half a foot or so above the table top it sits on since I didn't anticipate not having that extra 6" that a pedestal stand would have given me.  I did find a couple of inexpensive table top stands for small flat screens, but the ones that mount the TV to vertical rails are probably out of the question since directly below the mounting screw holes in the TV are the HDMI and component video inputs. These sockets would be blocked by the rails.Then there is the sound.  In a word, awful. It sounds as bad as any tinny set of PC speakers built into a 20" monitor.Finally (and this is minor I'll admit) is the time it takes the TV to start showing broadcast TV when it is first turned on (at least 15 seconds) and the time it takes to display the previous channel when switching back and forth (around 3 seconds).

Reviews.Title: Another Great Vizio
Reviews.Author: GrapevineGrammie
Reviews.Content: Our family has 10 vizio's of different sizes among us (3 families) and no disappointments yet.  This one i was able to install all by myself and it looks great!

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: DP
Reviews.Content: The TV was delivered on time and in good condition.  I have been using it for a few months and it has a really good picture/color/clarity.  I use a home theatre system so I cannot comment on its sound quality.  I have used the internet connection a few times and it is cumbersome trying to use the remote control as the "keyboard" so it takes a while.  I have had no issues watching You Tube videos or connecting my laptop to it in order to watch other videos.  Overall I am very happy with the TV.

Reviews.Title: Pretty nice tv for the money
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Shaffer "Little May"
Reviews.Content: This is a purchase that replaced a really old portable tv with a built in dvd player, so the update alone was a great improvement. I've been pretty happy with my purchase. There a few things I don't like, but overall, it is a pretty good bargain. For less than $200 I was able to get an HD TV that has built in Netflix and Amazon Prime. This saved me having to buy a Roku or similar device just for these two features. The quality of the picture I get with Netflix is excellent. The quality of the picture I get with my Dish Network receiver is not quite so good, but then again, my Dish receiver set up remotely to the primary tv and only the first tv gets HD, the second is in SD, which is a whole separate issue. I'd have to add a Hopper to get HD on the second set. The screen size for normal viewing is not 24" and while you can select three other settings, I find this feature really annoying. I leave it in the "normal" viewing size because the "wide" "panoramic" and "zoom" settings add slight distortions to the picture. Netflix comes up in full screen size, so I'm really not sure what the deal is with that. The other thing I'm not too crazy about is the matte finish (versus glossy) picture screen. I thought I might like it, but when I compare it to my Samsung 50" I realize that I guess I really do prefer a glossy picture. However, the bottom line is that I still feel like it was a good deal for the money. I really didn't want to spend more for a second tv that gets limited use anyway. If I could afford to spend twice as much money, I would get something else, but I'm really happy with the tv and would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO screwed up on the Amazon Application
Reviews.Author: Kaylee Brown
Reviews.Content: I just purchased TV and am happy with it as a whole, except one thing.  Having the Amazon Instant Video application relegated to a small portion of the left hand screen is horrible.  Plus I can't get to my watch list what a waste.  Considering returning the TV if they don't update the application soon.  The application should be full screen just as HuluPlus, Netflix, MGO, etc. are.  I understand that the way it is set up allows for continued viewing of video content while you browse, but the text and pictures are way to small especially for a 32 inch TV.  Some of the other applications are better suited for dual action, but Amazon Instant Video is definitely not one of them.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E291i-A1 Smart TV from Amazon
Reviews.Author: WV Elaine
Reviews.Content: We bought this Vizio E291i-A1 Smart TV from Amazon for use in front of our treadmill. It was easy to setup and works as expected. We use this smart TV to connect thru our dual band router to Netflix and other streaming sources. We also have it connected to DirecTV. As I recall, to attached the TV base/stand to the TV you need a Phillips screwdriver with a #1 blade/tip and a shank of over one inch (to fit thru the opening in the base). I started the two screws in the TV to condition the threads, unscrewed them, snapped the base into the TV, stood the TV on edge on a bed (mattress), and put in the screws. With this approach it was easy. We used free shipping from Amazon, but the TV arrived at least a week before the original estimate. The TV comes with a Quick Start Guide which is adequate. We downloaded the manual from Vizio. We had tried first to buy this Vizio model from a big box store, and they sold us a TV in a box that looked unopened. Turns out the big box store TV we bought was not a smart TV and the model and serial # of the TV in the box did not match the model or serial number on the label or receipt. We got a full refund from the big box store and ordered the TV from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: great set
Reviews.Author: philip braschler
Reviews.Content: Great TV and easy to set up.  I guess.  Son had it going with his box on it before I ever got home.  Didn't even get to unrap my own present.  Apps are good and come in handy.  Picture is awesome except for border if I could just get everybody to leave it on normal.  Now for a sound bar.

Reviews.Title: OVERALL SATISFACTORY !
Reviews.Author: Richard T. Bender
Reviews.Content: PICTURE IS WONDERFUL.  AUDIO COULD BE A LITTLE BETTER. DELIVERY WAS  EARLY AND MADE US HAPPY SINCE WE WERE ABLE TO ENJOY THE TV.

Reviews.Title: Nice tv
Reviews.Author: Tyrell
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my mother as a replacement for a super old CRT in her bedroom.  The smart features work great with netflix/pandora and was super easy to sertup to her home wfi.  Price was very reasonable and you cannot beat Amazon Prime shipping.

Reviews.Title: ExcellentTV but slow to boot up
Reviews.Author: Robert K. Bequette
Reviews.Content: We would like to know how you get this TV  to start quick like out other TV's.  I have read instructions we downloaded and find nothing about this.  On the positive side, it is not wasting electricity when turned off.  Robert Bequette

Reviews.Title: Took awhile to get smart
Reviews.Author: berkeleybart
Reviews.Content: Original review, 2/8/14: Good picture, easy to set up and use, but not smart enough to connect reliably to my wi-fi network. Won't even work via Ethernet -- tells me to upgrade my router, which has been more than adequate for streaming movies and TV over my Roku box (along with a wireless desktop computer, two wireless printers, a couple of laptops, a couple of smartphones, etc.). I bought this set to replace a dying Sony, which was hooked up to Roku -- the same Roku I'm now having to use to watch streaming video on my "smart" Vizio. (BTW and FWIW, the Roku's Amazon interface is far superior to Vizio's app, which doesn't allow you to maintain a watchlist, even if you can use the app.)That said, nice picture. And it works swell with a Roku box (not included)...Update, 2/9/14: After being totally uselsess as a smart TV for 24 hours, the set miraculously connected to my wi-fi network this morning. All the apps work, everything's good.I'm leaving my rating at 3 stars until I'm convinced this is a permanent fix. If I've upgraded to 4 stars, that means it works, and I'd recommend the set.

Reviews.Title: I love it, perfect for any room (not living room which needs bigger)
Reviews.Author: Chuck Walker
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is awesome, tons of input plugs, so many apps that makes it awesome. I love using my pandora.. the video stream thru house network is not good and very limited on what it plays (i still use my ps3 for this).. note it works fine with divix and xvid files but the rest are hit and miss.. and xvid/divix are not HD enough for me... I find this with most tv's even at friends houses...picture quality is very HD, love it.. well worth the $250... and 29" vs 32" is not noticable at all, so dont spent the other $50 on 32"..

Reviews.Title: Absolute Garbage
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this TV. Has a particularly horrible problem with netflix and has become worse and worse. Had to send the first TV back after having someone from Vizio come and replace a part only to put the original part back in. Second TV worked better in terms of the wireless signal and it's ability to connect to the apps which it has ie amazon, netflix, etc. Over a few months it has basically become non functional and a total waste of money since this is the reason it was purchased. Very disappointed with purchase and would not recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Calli Williams
Reviews.Content: Great tv! Perfect for watching netflix....for sure a great value for the price.  This was the most inexpensive Smart tv I could find and it exceeded my expectations!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV
Reviews.Author: Kristina Riley
Reviews.Content: My hubby is the techie in our house and he has confirmed this smart TV has all the bells and whistles that other TV's twice the cost have.  The LED screen really makes a difference as we have a lot of windows in our living room and the glare is greatly reduced.  We still need to tweek the color a bit as out of the box it is not good, but overall - great purchase, very happy.

Reviews.Title: vizio smart tv
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: this itiem is ok, the remote does not turn on the tv, it trys to turn it on when I push the power button and the light turns on. on the tv but it just doesn't turn on. also you cannot surf the web with this tv all you can do is have a very limited number of apps, and I mean very limited, but it has good quality picture when hdmi is hooked up!

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Michael donajkowski "FollowerofGod"
Reviews.Content: I am really enjoying this product. Amazon's price was way better than average. The only negatives are no specific audio adjustments.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Carol M. Jones "CMJ4164"
Reviews.Content: I love the TV.  It's great in the bedroom and I love the wi-fi access.  The picture is sharp and clear.  I can even read the cc from across the room.

Reviews.Title: Big, Plastic, and seemingly fragile
Reviews.Author: J Ponder
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately, I returned this device.  It was big and clunky.  I did not like the VIZIO Smart interface.  Maybe I got spoiled by LG, Samsung, and Sony.  It could not could to my PC to stream movie files (and if you could, I could not find anywhere to see the networked PCs).  Just pulling it out the box  you could feel components insides shaking. I could not get beyond the user interface and the clunky, fragile, plastic feel.I can't say anything about the picture quality that made me dislike.  It seemed fine.  However, that was overshadowed by items mentioned above.

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV
Reviews.Author: Manchester
Reviews.Content: To keep it simple; Amazing price, quality, and size. Definitely hard to find a competitor that can beat Vizio in these 3 aspects, and I will always be a fan.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Richard W. Walesch
Reviews.Content: Went shopping for a TV and found this Visio. We wanted a 42 inch . We looked at department stores and saw this Visio and loved the picture and price so we came home and ordered it at Amazon. Amazon's price was even better. They shipped it right away and had it in three days. This is a great TV with all the features.

Reviews.Title: Vizio e500i
Reviews.Author: Alan Haimowitz
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv as a present and was not pleased with the sharpness of the picture should have returned it but did not have the box.

Reviews.Title: Perfect.
Reviews.Author: michael c novak
Reviews.Content: What a nice t.v.! For e money you can't go wrong. So glad I choose this one. Will allow me to watch t.v. Outside at our gazebo. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Gayle Joseph-McClorin
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews before I bought this TV and I love it. The sound is great and even got the sound bar before I got the TV and it just enhances the sound but its not needed. I give this product a great review because although I was worried about the sound I am very much pleased with this product. I also bought the remote with the keyboard on the back and that works great with the apps on the TV.

Reviews.Title: remote device
Reviews.Author: ted
Reviews.Content: the remote  is too small for all the functions and did not like the Neftlix  Amazon etc buttons. otherwise set is good.

Reviews.Title: Great TV & value
Reviews.Author: Richard S. Butwin
Reviews.Content: Between home and office I have purchased 6 Vizio TVs in the past year (3x70", 1x42", 2x32"). They all work great. It is also nice having all the same brand for the remotes and settings. My fancier friends have Samsung. I consider myself reasonably savvy with this kind of stuff and I cannot tell the difference. I think Vizio is a no-brainer.

Reviews.Title: Love my new tv
Reviews.Author: Photomom "Photomom"
Reviews.Content: Wanted this tv for the kitchen. Tv arrived on time.  Picture is clear; sound is ok. Was easy to set upHappy with Vizio products. this is our 4th set. all our working fine-no problems.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money
Reviews.Author: tommy
Reviews.Content: I have had this tv for a couple of months and it preforms well and has a sharp picture.Don't have any consI would recommend this tv to all who want a well balanced product without spending  a lot of money.

Reviews.Title: Nice picture, terrible wifi
Reviews.Author: Henry
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my parents for Christmas. The set-up was simple and the picture and sound are nice, but the wifi keeps dropping its connection. I had a Roku bix on the previous tv and it worked perfect as the network has a strong signal. I may have to run a wired connection to the tv.I'll update as I work on it.

Reviews.Title: Christmas for my family
Reviews.Author: Daniel Cosgrove
Reviews.Content: Researched many different brands and providers and am totally satisfied with Amazon. The package had a gouge in it during shipping but no damage was done to the television. The VIZIO  E420i - AO 42 - inch Smart TV is a great fit. Haven't given a five rating because it was turned on for only a few minutes  in order to program it on Christmas Eve. It looked great and the picture, before any necessary adjustments, seems fine and clear. So far, all of my dealings with Amazon have been satisfactory, from ordering to arrival all has been  quite satisfactory. The remote is cracked but can be replaced. My granddaughter just couldn't wait to watch the Disney Channel.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Mike Kendall
Reviews.Content: Easy to hook up. Fantastic picture. All features have worked great!Would definately reccomend to anyone who is interested in a greatsmart TV.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Jeff S
Reviews.Content: This is the second Vizio TV I have purchased. And just like the last one I'm really happy with the quality. It was very easy to set up, and amazingly good picture quality. I had looked at other TVs in the same price range and this was by far the best picture and best features for any 42-inch class TV.Also, having the smart TV apps are great. It's a one button connection to having Netflix or Hulu. I highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 42" HDTV
Reviews.Author: Reaper_X
Reviews.Content: This is my first digital tv so I only have an older analogue tv to compare it to. I love this hdtv!  It has a beautiful picture,especially on the hd channels. i can't believe I waited this long to buy one. It has a lot of functions that I haven't even checked out yet. I guess the bottom line is that I am very pleased with it and would recommend it to anyone considering the purchase of a new one.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: rojelio aldama
Reviews.Content: Great tv for the prize. If you want to complain about it simply pay for higher end model. Lots of compliments from sony owners.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the quality for the price
Reviews.Author: John E. Gallo
Reviews.Content: For the money this Vizio far surpassed my expectation.  The picture led picture is stunning, It is better than most of the top name brands  They have come a long way from their earlier sets it is filled with features that don't come with sets twice the price

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV - great value
Reviews.Author: R. G. Phipps "rphipps124"
Reviews.Content: My reference point for comparing this tv is a five year old 37" Vizio LED TV.  Let's start of by noting that it is thin and relatively light. We were able to take it put of the box and place it on the stand with no trouble. When we powered it up, the tv led me through a guided setup, got it on the network, and registered the TV. I really liked this.The picture was excellent.  My mother in law, (it's her tv) noted how crisp and clear it was for her, and started to chuckle at how much detail it revealed of the local tv anchors.  I was impressed at how bright the tv was.  We both very much liked the on screen controls. She particularly liked the ability to label the inputs with user friendly names (Cable, Roku, Blu Ray) which had bedeviled her on her older tv.  The remote was friendly, and the tv played nice with her Verizon Fios cable box.The only minor criticism I have is the wireless seemed a bit flaky.  I could not get the Amazon app to load. This wasn't a big deal, and is something we will play with over time.  She generally prefers the Roku box and we didn't dwell on troubleshooting.The four hdmi ports are generous.  I was a little iffy about having two on the side, but was pleasantly surprised how well positioned they were and hid the hdmi cable I plugged into port 3.Overall, a gorgeous picture, relatively light weight, small bezel came together in a great package.

Reviews.Title: Not a bad purchase
Reviews.Author: E. Elisabeth Nyang
Reviews.Content: The stand that comes with this TV is a bit flimsy. Other than that, this is a good TV to have in your bedroom or study.

Reviews.Title: Loved it.
Reviews.Author: Kendra Schweitzer
Reviews.Content: We bought one for our kitchen and it was easy to use with a wonderful screen. It was so easy and nice for the price we bought another for our son's room. It's great for his games.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: PS
Reviews.Content: I love my new TV! The only thing I was disappointed with was that it does not have a browser. To me Smart meant - connect to the internet and be online! I have to give it 5 stars because this information is available I just did not do my research and assumed it should work with any web content. Turns out it only works with apps that have been developed for that specific tv... The Netflix app is perfect - I have access to my list, recommended shows separated into categories displayed on the full screen! I love the new feature where Netflix automatically plays Series episodes one after the other. With the Amazon app on the other hand, I have to click 6 times back and forth, up and down until i get to the next episode, and I have not figured out a way to save my streaming included with membership shows in a list, so I have to search for a show - type its name - every time I turn on the tv... Very disappointing. Netflix is the leader - I will not give it up! Otherwise, the TV is great - this is my first flat screen but I can compare the picture to my friends TVs and I like mine better :) Good contrast and easy access to multiple picture adjustments - for example I lowered the saturation :)

Reviews.Title: Mom,s 80th birthday present.
Reviews.Author: karen begeman
Reviews.Content: She wasn't to excited when she saw a tv but now that its up and running my mom and my dad love it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Sharon Mizerny
Reviews.Content: This bargain TV replaced a 32", so it seems great.  It was very easy to hook up to cable, connect to our wireless router, and blueray.  We record many programs with the DVR and all is going well...no HD breakup like on the other TV.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Ross
Reviews.Content: I got a sweet deal on this tv and after owning it I would've paid full price for. Love Vizio and can't wait to get the sound bar soon

Reviews.Title: Product is good.
Reviews.Author: Stephen St.Clair
Reviews.Content: I have it in the bedroom for my wife to watch and have it linked with movie streaming. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Love, love, love it!!
Reviews.Author: lvsunshine
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this Smart Flat Screen TV to anyone!!!  The picture is clear and vibrant, easy to control and amazing that it already has Netflix and Prime TV built into the remote control!! We don't watch "mainstream TV" ! Sooo, this has worked out perfectly for me and my 4 year old grand-daughter...she can just press the Netflix button and she is able to watch all kinds of children movies without people being naked or having an intimate relationship! Anyway, back to the TV, it does just about everything from watching it, looking at your pictures, listening to music or even the weather. I could go on and on how great this make and model is but I'd begin to become more repetitive and who would like that? The only thing I'm not happy with is that the remote control is way to little and buttons are pressed to close together; however, it is something that you can easily overlook!

Reviews.Title: Great for viewing
Reviews.Author: Shyam
Reviews.Content: I bought the 39 inch and it is absolutely great for viewing. Youtube and netflix is superb on this one. For my xbox this is perfect. Good for an apartment. I wud definitely recommend this one !!

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E320i-A0 32-inch 720p 60Hz LED Smart HDTV
Reviews.Author: 808soljahz
Reviews.Content: i chose this rating because i totally love my new tv:) it was what i wanted now having this tv i would love to order another one for my parents and i would love to have the size bigger as well!! :)

Reviews.Title: Pretty Damn Good
Reviews.Author: R. Graner
Reviews.Content: Very good product. I can't remember if I bought a refurbished one or not because there is a small cloudy spot the size of a silver dollar (for those who remember what size that is) It's not irritating but is noticeable in brighter scenes. Hook-up was so simple and my netflix works flawlessly. I also have the new chromecast wifi hook-up for all my other computer streaming, this is different from the TV but it works without any other wires or complications. Overall I am extremely satisfied with this purchase and recommend it to you others.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I was looking for!
Reviews.Author: Alexandria Jones
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I was looking for in a tv! Love that it's a smart tv in such a small size

Reviews.Title: great for the price.
Reviews.Author: Matt R Bier
Reviews.Content: all around good tv. connects to computer through hdmi with no problems. easy to set up. good quality picture. pretty much like any other vizio...

Reviews.Title: Love my Vizio!
Reviews.Author: EnidT
Reviews.Content: I chose this Tv after doing research on several models in this class. It seemed this model was given thumbs up every where I looked. It took a little to get used to the size since it was replacing a 23" tube Tv. It seemed tiny in comparison but the convenience of having all the apps I use on screen and the clear picture and sound won me over. Also, it uses about $6 in electricity per year. I was sold!

Reviews.Title: Great TV - Speakers are so-so
Reviews.Author: Scott Beauchemin
Reviews.Content: This TV has loads of options.  The reason I went with this TV is the internet apps.  We use Pandora, netflix and Hulu and there are tons and tons of other apps and even games.The 2 negatives I have are the speaker and the remote.  The speaker is pretty cheap.  Don't expect movie theater sound quality out of the speakers.  You could get a sound bar as a alternative. The remote works fine, but the buttons feel cheap.  No big deal.  I do wish you could program special buttons. Example:  There is a button on the remote for Netflix and it takes you to netflix, but if you want to go directly in to pandora, there is no button and you can't program one of the buttons for pandora.  Again, not a big deal, but would be a nice to have feature.So if you are looking for a decent TV with a ton of internet options, this is a great buy.  Would be great for a kids room or a workout room or even in a dorm room.  Would not be a great TV to use as your main TV.

Reviews.Title: Visio E470i-AO TV
Reviews.Author: nancy jacomella "bigg010"
Reviews.Content: I love my new TV !!!Bigger than I intended to buy, but, the price was right from amazon.Easy to set up, even for grandmas'.Great picture and sound.Fast delivery, right into my living room !!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Brian Saltos
Reviews.Content: Love the tv. Have had no problems with it so far. Image is clear sound is great. I would recommend others to buy.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E390i-A1
Reviews.Author: Larry Burns
Reviews.Content: Met all my needs.  Mounted it in my RV and it fits perfect, lighter weight than it's predecessor and the picture is great just like on my other 3 Vizio TVs.  Very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Simplify and De-Clutter with this all-in-one solution.
Reviews.Author: Bumbler
Reviews.Content: I bought this Digital Ready, Wi-Fi ready, HDTV to replace an old 19 inch TV, Tuning adapter and Roku box that was cluttering up the kids room. I got rid of the boxes, wires and extra remotes. Now the room looks Fantastic and with the one remote we can turn on the TV, Amazon Prime and let Dora the Explorer and other kids shows babysit. Mounted on wall with VideoSecu TV Wall Mount Articulating Arm Bracket for VESA 100 LCD LED Flat Panel Screen TV and Monitor ML10B 1E9, outdoor antenna  Winegard HD7694P High Definition VHF/UHF Antenna both from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: i just made another great purchase on amazon , i am very happy

Reviews.Content: my first new tv in 15 years , it took 2 people to carry the old tv out , once I got it plugged in I was amazed at how nice the picture was,after about 2 hours I realized I had not tried a hd channel , wow I am hooked

Reviews.Title: great tv!

Reviews.Title: Great TV! Easy to set-up, good picture for the price!

Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for my parents. Very happy with the quality. Good picture for the price compared to other brands, easy to use, and has good sound.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!

Reviews.Content: I love this television!  The picture is absolutely beautiful.  I love the ability to watch Net Flix without having another device.  I would recommend this to anyone looking for a smart tv for a small living room or bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Merritt Adams
Reviews.Content: I was debating about this TV, because many people said they had issues with sounds.  I have not had any issues with the sound.  It is a great TV, nice picture and good sound.  I have it hooked to apple TV and netflix.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Andrew Diffenderfer
Reviews.Content: Great image quality, easy to set up and a good overall value.  Highly recommend for small spaces that require a narrow framed TV.  Very clean look.

Reviews.Title: Smart choice on Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Terry Coles
Reviews.Content: This was a great deal, Loved the features, picture very sharp.  I bought 2, one for my daughter in college and one for my bedroom.  l love the Netflix feature, no extra box needed.I considering purchasing another as a gift.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV!!!
Reviews.Author: Douglas
Reviews.Content: This TV set is very nice for the price. Love the Netflix capability!!!image is very good. No complains at all.

Reviews.Title: My new Vizio
Reviews.Author: Shirley McMahon
Reviews.Content: I am pleased with the clarity and the ease of set-up.  The size is smaller than the one I replaced, and fits very well in the room.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E320i - A0 32 inch 720p 60hz
Reviews.Author: Charles Bohlman
Reviews.Content: had all of the features it had advertised and they were easy to use through my existing WiFi in my home. Picture is good. Sound is good. I wanted Wi Fi because I thought I might be able to use a browser on the TV but alas it does not have one. I may use the Net Flix app but will likely use none of th others although I could see persons of different interests doing so.I bought the refurbished. I could not have known after the box was opened.720p and 60HZ is fine for 32". Save your money until you need a bigger one.

Reviews.Title: Smart tv - worth the investment
Reviews.Author: Emmalani "Emma"
Reviews.Content: Pros: Convenient for online tv or movie viewing (such as net flix, hulu, etc) & checking online stuff,better picture quality than LCD's which I also have Cons: sound quality is not stereo HOWEVER if you connect it to a sound bar / stereo system it may improve sound quality also doesn't turn on or change channel as quickly as other tv's (if you expect immediate results)

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Ceeloud
Reviews.Content: I love my tv, it came quickly and it is a great value for the price.  I'm not tech savvy but it works great for my purpose which is just regular tv watching.  Also I found that Amazon had the best online price for it.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I got this TV for the fact it 1080p mainly but when I saw smart TV too I had to get it for the price. Fatastic perfect size for my room and to game on. Sound is eh, but if I want better sound that's what home audio equipment is for.

Reviews.Title: Great tv.
Reviews.Author: Zorah
Reviews.Content: Great tv, HDMI to laptop works great with a belkin cable. Perfect for my dorm, it's really light so I can transport it easily. It looks awesome and works awesome.

Reviews.Title: Works really nice
Reviews.Author: Gildagor
Reviews.Content: Streaming Netflix is awesome on this TV; great purchase for the price :) I would buy another Vizio for my next TV.

Reviews.Title: Great little tv

Reviews.Content: Bought it for my girlfriend and she absolutely loves the thing. I can't get her attention away from it now.

Reviews.Title: VIZio

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: I had an older LCD TV that finally bit the dust and wasn't sure what to replace it with.  This TV was a great price and looks great as well.  The LED screen is very sharp and I have the additional Smart Apps.  I really don't use them that often as I have a PS3 and Google Chromecast.  Great TV though highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Garrett
Reviews.Content: TPicture quality is very good. I am sure it is not quite as good as a higher end Samsung, but I am happy with it regardless of price. Considering the price of this TV, I am very happy with the performance for the money.The Netflix app works great.The remote is just average.The built in speakers are OK... better than I expected, but not great. Reviews.Title: works great for personal TV and monitor
Reviews.Author: ten1426
Reviews.Content: I replaced my 46" LED TV with this personal HDTV, so I can set it up on my desk and use it as an extended PC monitor. It works great for me as I can switch input between PC RGB mode, TV Antenna, HDMI, and AV, etc.The wifi setup is fast and it find the signal right away. I watched netflix often and it's so convenient.Resolution and picture quality is great.I actually bought this from Costco. They had it all sold out and only had a returned unit. I decided to take it, and it works perfect.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Gregory Loper
Reviews.Content: The quality is impressive compared to my old 32" LCD. The Apps are nice. You can add or remove apps if you don't like or use the ones already installed. The backlight sensor is on auto by default, which made the picture get bright and dark back and forth at first until I shut it off. I don't think it likes the lighting of my room. Just something to be aware of. Overall, it's a great tv.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: remorgan
Reviews.Content: Seems like a good product no problems so far.It has performed as well as I expected it to perform. Thumbs up.

Reviews.Title: Awesome value
Reviews.Author: SM Garay
Reviews.Content: Great TV and so easy to set up with my prime instant vidieo and Amazon prime account. I do not even need cable!

Reviews.Title: This is a great little TV!
Reviews.Author: K. Arnold
Reviews.Content: I have limited requirements for television and a small space.  I also needed to upgrade from my 27" CT, circa 1993 that finally died after many years of faithful service.  I dumped the local cable and took a package with the phone company and am so impressed with what a television can do in the 21st century!  If you need a lot, read further and get details from the techno geeks, but I have not been sorry for a minute to have purchased this set.  Great picture.  Sound is acceptable. Excellent value.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Jepz
Reviews.Content: I would say that for the price range it was in and all the features that has, this a tv worth your money.  The wi-fi and the built in apps are great and worked perfectly and easy to use.  I had a day of trouble with the remote control that made me thought of returning, gladly, after some cable plugging and pulling, somehow it got fixed. - I'd say by the way things went, the back panel is a bit sensitive and kind of fragile.. not sure if remote control wirings are close to it or somehow connected but as far as I remember, remote control suddenly became significantly lagging after connecting the coaxial cable (even after couple of soft reset and a hard reset).  In the end, after connecting another cable and disconnecting the coaxial cable, it worked perfectly from then on - coincidental?.. I don't know.  Anyway, as far as video quality, yes it's got great and vivid colors but if you see somebody write about significant change in color quality at an angle, that is totally true!  But then again, how much did you pay it for? For me the pro's still outweigh the cons - it's a great tv for the price!

Reviews.Title: Best deal on the Internet

Reviews.Content: I have been wanting a Smart HDTV and this is the best deal I have ever seen.  I look at other sites but none can compare to an AMAZONE DEAL

Reviews.Title: Smart quality at a good price!

Reviews.Content: I wanted a  TV for my office small enough to fit on my executive size desk. This fit perfectly. I also has all the built ins and inputs to connect to my computer.  As of now it is hooked up to straight cable and with the tuner I receive all channels except premium. The remote is fast and smooth much better than the Insignia 24" I bought for my kitchen a year ago. That set is LED 1080p too but the controls are so slow and no last channel jump button and that is frustrating.  This VIZIO has no such cliches.

Reviews.Title: Great patio/screened in porch HDTV

I was specifically looking for a TV that would fit under my kitchen cabinets and it does. The picture is crisp and clear. I really like how quickly the channels change. It's been a pet peeve of mine ever since digital TVs appeared on the market. This seems to change much faster. I've had this for quite a while now with no issues whatsoever.  Perfect for the kitchen.

Reviews.Title: Perfect size for the kids
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: LOVE the remote with a Netflix button! Easy to use and has a ton of options for Amazon, Hulu, Netflix, etc. Great picture, we have had it for 8 months and moved it across the country. It works great!

Reviews.Title: A cheaper TV that is as good as any.
Reviews.Author: Christy
Reviews.Content: Going into TV shopping, my husband and I knew what size we wanted, and that we wanted one with a very slim frame. To make a long story short, going to the store and seeing them all next to each other, of course the Samsungs look better than say the Vizios and the LGs. But once you've finished comparing them all, this TV is pretty great for the price. Our seating is about 15 feet from our TV, which is mounted above our fireplace. Even from a slight angle, the picture is outstanding, (with all the manufacturers settings..we actually haven't changed them, although I notice the saturation could be turned down a bit). We plan on possibly adding a soundbar or surround sound in the future, but even the speakers on this TV are pretty good. We have a PS3 and haven't really used the smartTV functions, although we have plugged in a flash drive to look at pictures, and the menus were easy to navigate. It's nice to know the smartTV functions are there if we want them. This definitely beats paying almost twice as much for a high end name brand TV and the quality seems to be there, we have a smaller Vizio TV and it has held up well and the picture is still very good. I'd definitely recommend this TV to someone looking for a quality picture and nice, sharp looking TV but trying to stay on a tight budget.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E Series 24" LED Smart HDTV
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: Love this TV...........picture is great.....the actual viewing size is larger due to a smaller frame.  Especially nice are the apps that are integrated into the TV like Netflix, Amazon and others.  All you have to do is connect the TV to your ISP router wirelessly and you can watch movies, listen to music, etc without having to have a separate box to connect. Set up and the interface is very user friendly too.  I actually have this TV set up to receive just local channels with a Leaf Antenna and can get at least 25 local channels that come in very clear.  They have a lot of sizes but be sure you it is a "Smart" HDTV..

Reviews.Content: I paid $548.00 for this 47 inch smart tv and the picture is excellent, and great features. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Great TV

Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for my daughters room. She loves it. We don't even have it connected to directv. We just use it to stream amazon prime, Netflix and watch blu-ray's on. The picture quality is fantastic and it was very easy to set up. I will probably buy another one for my other daughters room.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the value!
Reviews.Author: Pete
Reviews.Content: The price is right!  At this pricing point, this TV is a great value.  We use it as our main TV, and the quality is great.  We use the apps for Amazon Video and Netflix, and couldn't be happier with the interface and the picture quality while streaming these services.  The setup was easy and within 5 minutes we were watching our new TV.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: Extremely satisfied with this television. Great size at an affordable cost. I have seen better quality televisions, but at this price point this LED has exceeded expectations.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous TV!
Reviews.Author: Former Baker
Reviews.Content: This LED TV is very bright, with vibrant colors and crisp pictures, but is also very energy-efficient.  I no longer feel guilty about having the TV on all day while I am either sick, and thus wanting to do nothing, or when I am cleaning, because I know it is using little energy.I have used Amazon Prime Instant Videos extensively with this television, and have not had any issues with connectivity or with the TV dropping the wireless signal.  Accessing Amazon, Netflix, and M-Go is extremely easy with this TV; there is a button across the top of the remote for each.  One simply has to push the button and search for the video/topic one wants.The remote control is fairly self-explanatory, but I do wish it had a QWERTY keyboard to make it easier and faster to use the "Smart" features of the television.  The on-screen keyboard is not difficult to use, but does take more time to use than would a QWERTY keyboard.Setting up this TV takes about five minutes because everything is easy to locate and access.  Plugging in the cable or antenna is easy (mine is a coax cable), and so is plugging in the HDMI cable for a DVD player.  While I do not have my Wii set up on this television, I can see how easy it would be (the attachments are very accessible).UPDATE, 10.20.13-- I have reduced my rating by one star because of an issue that is arising more and more often now.  When I push the button for Amazon, the TV more often than not just "spins" as it is "loading" Amazon.  It can "spin" for an hour or more before it finally loads.  Pushing exit or turning off the TV and turning it back on doesn't solve the issue.  This is happening more and more often, and it is VERY annoying.

Reviews.Title: Nice picture and good features

Reviews.Content: Set up the smart tv pretty effortlessly for amazon and Netflix.  THe picture quality is excellent even with a non HDMI cable connection

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Television for the Price!

I love the Vizio brand, and I cannot recommend this television enough to anyone looking for a 32" TV.  If you're considering buying it - definitely do it.

Reviews.Title: Good TV, but apps a little slow to start
Reviews.Author: Josh V
Reviews.Content: So I purchased this TV after reading multiple reviews and trying to pick the best TV for the price. I wanted a smart TV (so I could use my PS3 in the man cave) and did not want to purchase a roku or apple tv if i could get most of the same features in one purchase. This is by far the cheapest 47" smart TV on the market! I was like most a little nervous about the apps, as that was the only reason i purchased this particular one. I read the picture needed adjustment, but to be honest I havent touched any screen settings and I think the picture quality out of the box is rather nice. I ran into an issue when it came to the apps though. Like many stated when you cut the tv on (which takes at least 20s to boot up) the apps are slow to pop up. I think it has to establish internet connection each time. After being on for a minute however it works just fine. My issue came when trying to watch a movie. Netflix worked great and loaded faster than i thought it would, but after 10min of viewing it froze and tried to reload and would just freeze. I thought it was just the internet and it was fine so I tried another app. Youtube worked fine and Hulu worked. Tried Netflix again and after 10min it did the same thing. I then tried a long youtube video and oddly enough it froze at 10min and the same with Hulu. So I called vizio and was excited to hear an american voice so that was a plus! After talking with them for an hour and trying multiple steps they still had no idea what was causing it. So we did a restart by holding the power button for 2min with the tv unplugged and on their end they did something with registering my tv on their server again. Since then (crossfingers) it has worked perfectly with no complaints. I will update in a few weeks, but expect good things from this great priced Item! for sure reccommend it!

Reviews.Title: bad utube app??
Reviews.Author: arizona
Reviews.Content: I took a chance and bought [thru amazon] one of the first [e500i-a1] in december 2012. After 7 months of use with this I have tried many of the apps and have used many of the tv functions. No major problems/complaints except for the utube app. It is constantly buffering giving unusable audio/vidio [most of the time]. It does seem to run better at certain times of the day. I have called vizio support several times but they said there is nothing more they can do and suggested it was an utube problem of some sort? I use cox cable with more than enough bandwidth. I have tried it on 2 different modems [at vizio's suggestion I even tried a direct LAN connection to the e500i-a1 from the modem thereby eliminating any router/wifi/cabling/etc problems]. I have tried most of the other vidio apps such as hulu,vudu/etc and all work without problems. The utube app has no picture quality setting for streaming/etc [like when using utube on a computer] so its hard to say what the app does [except its not good]. The utube rev level presently is v1.0.2 and all the utube vidios that I have tried on the e500i-a1 run without problem [at max. quality level setting] on all my 3 computers [even when streaming to all 3 at the same time]. All HD thru the cox cable box work fine. So if anybody has a comment or solution please post any info.

No one was touching the remote.The remote is not backlit, which makes it a pain to use in the dark if this is going to be your bedroom TV.I returned it.
